title: Add playlist history command
description: Implement 'mx-lite history' that shows the last N playlists generated (stored automatically, not requiring --save). Store minimal metadata in ~/.config/mixaroo-lite/history.json: prompt, song count, timestamp, YouTube URL. Show last 20 by default, support --limit flag.
acceptance_criteria: Every generate command auto-logs to history.json

comments.text: History command done. Auto-logs every generation, mx-lite history with --limit. 8 new tests, 164 total passing.
